turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want to place a fairly big pickup order from a pizzeria called Bella Luna. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I want to order a pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat lovers for all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have like a thick crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, let's do thick crust for all three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 3 large meatlovers with thick crust and extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent, thank you for your help.
